original: @119b */ // 'phags pa sa bcu'i mdo sde'i gleng gzhi bzhugs /
analyzed: @119b */ // 'phags pa sa bcu'i mdo sde'i gleng gzhi bzhugs /
translated: The Introduction to the Ten Grounds S≈´tra

original: # // 'phags pa sa bcu'i mdo sde'i gleng gzhi bshad pa /
analyzed: # // 'phags pa sa bcu'i mdo sde'i gleng gzhi bshad pa /
translated: The Explanation of the Introduction to the Ten Grounds S≈´tra

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo ;
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo ;
translated: Homage to youthful Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po zhes bya ba la /
translated: The great assembly of bodhisattvas.

original: chen po ni yon tan dang grangs kyis so //
analyzed: chen po ni yon tan dang grangs kyis so //
translated: Great means in terms of qualities and numbers.

original: de la thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ba nas bzung ste /
analyzed: de la thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ba nas bzung ste /
translated: Among them, all of them are irreversible.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sde snod kyi yon tan sgrub pa shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa bskal pa brjod du med pa rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu bstan pas yon tan bsngags pa'i bstan pa zad mi shes pa sha stag ces bya ba'i bar 'dis
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sde snod kyi yon tan sgrub pa shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa bskal pa brjod du med pa rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu bstan pas yon tan bsngags pa'i bstan pa zad mi shes pa sha stag ces bya ba'i bar 'dis
translated: From there up to all the bodhisattvas are completely perfected in the qualities of the canon, and through continuously teaching for inexpressible eons, they are all inexhaustible in their teachings of praise of qualities.

original: ni yon tan gyi che ba bstan to //
analyzed: ni yon tan gyi che ba bstan to //
translated: This teaches the greatness of their qualities.

original: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan gyi khyad par ni rnam pa lngar brjod de /
analyzed: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan gyi khyad par ni rnam pa lngar brjod de /
translated: Here the distinctive qualities of the bodhisattvas are described in five ways.

original: mngon sum du lung bstan pa thob pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid du nye ba dang / yid kyi cho 'phrul dang / lus kyi cho 'phrul dang / ngag gi cho 'phrul lo //
analyzed: mngon sum du lung bstan pa thob pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid du nye ba dang / yid kyi cho 'phrul dang / lus kyi cho 'phrul dang / ngag gi cho 'phrul lo //
translated: the attainment of the prophecy, the nearness to Buddhahood, the magical power of mind, the magical power of body, and the magical power of speech.

original: de la phyir mi ldog ba zhes bya ba 'dis mngon sum du lung bstan pa thob par bstan te //üîΩ'di ltar sa brgyad pa la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag sangs rgyas nyid @120a * //
analyzed: de la phyir mi ldog ba zhes bya ba 'dis mngon sum du lung bstan pa thob par bstan te // 'di ltar sa brgyad pa la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag sangs rgyas nyid @120a * //
translated: Here, the one called ‚Äúirreversible‚Äù indicates the attainment of the prophecy.

original: du sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon sum du lung ston te /
analyzed: du sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon sum du lung ston te /
translated: Thus, on the eighth stage, the irreversible Bodhisattvas attain the acquiescence to the noncreation of things, and the Buddhas prophesy their Buddhahood.

original: 'di nyid kyi bshad pa ni /üîΩthams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rab tu thob pa'i gnas bas gnas pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi bshad pa ni / thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rab tu thob pa'i gnas bas gnas pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary on this passage says:üîΩ‚ÄúAll of them are irreversible Bodhisattvas, because they have attained the domain of the wisdom of all Bodhisattvas.‚Äù

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes ni de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes ni de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'o //
translated: The wisdom of all Bodhisattvas is the observation of reality.

original: de'i spyod yul ni kun ba rtags pa'i chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa ste /
analyzed: de'i spyod yul ni kun ba rtags pa'i chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa ste /
translated: Its domain is the non-arising of all dharmas, which are conceptualized.

original: de la rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi gnyen pos rnyed pa ni rab tu thob pa'o //
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi gnyen pos rnyed pa ni rab tu thob pa'o //
translated: It is attained by the antidote to all conceptualization.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas pa ste /
translated: It is the state characterized by acquiescence in the non-arising of dharmas.

original: des sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa de dag la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: des sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa de dag la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: Those who have that state are said to be in the eighth stage.

original: des ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la lung bstan pa thob pas mngon sum du lung bstan pa zhes ston to //
analyzed: des ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la lung bstan pa thob pas mngon sum du lung bstan pa zhes ston to //
translated: This shows that they receive the prediction on the stage of nonregression.

original: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa zhes bya ba 'dis sangs rgyas nyid du nye bar bstan te /
analyzed: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa zhes bya ba 'dis sangs rgyas nyid du nye bar bstan te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúwho are impeded by only one birth‚Äù shows that they are near to Buddhahood.

original: de dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas nyid du skye ba gcig kho nas thogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas nyid du skye ba gcig kho nas thogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are impeded by only one birth in the future, they will attain Buddhahood.

original: 'di'i bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di'i bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of this is as follows.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul rtogs pa la 'jug pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i spyod yul pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul rtogs pa la 'jug pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i spyod yul pa zhes bya ste /
translated: They are called ‚Äúthose whose domain is the uninterrupted engagement in realizing the domain of the wisdom of all tathƒÅgatas.‚Äù

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par dben pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par dben pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The domain of the wisdom of all tathƒÅgatas is suchness, which is free from the obscurations of affliction and the knowable.

original: de nyid sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: That itself is buddhahood.

original: de rtogs pa ni khong du chud pa ste /
analyzed: de rtogs pa ni khong du chud pa ste /
translated: Realizing that is comprehending it.

original: de nyid 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'jug pa'o //
translated: That itself is engagement.

original: de la rgyun mi gcod pa thogs pa med par nus pa'i spyod yul pa ste /
analyzed: de la rgyun mi gcod pa thogs pa med par nus pa'i spyod yul pa ste /
translated: Those who are uninterrupted in that, whose domain is the ability to engage without obstruction,

original: mthu can gang yin pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: mthu can gang yin pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: are called ‚Äúthose who have power.‚Äù

original: 'jug pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: 'jug pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Engagement is threefold:

original: mos pas spyod pa'i sa la mos pas 'jug pa dang / rab tu dga' ba la sogs pas bcu rnams la de kho na rtogs pas 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis la rtogs pas 'jug ste /
analyzed: mos pas spyod pa'i sa la mos pas 'jug pa dang / rab tu dga' ba la sogs pas bcu rnams la de kho na rtogs pas 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis la rtogs pas 'jug ste /
translated: engagement through aspiration on the level of earnest aspiration, engagement through realizing thatness on the ten levels beginning with the joyous, and engagement through realizing buddhahood on the level of buddhahood.

original: de la 'jug pa gong ma gnyis las bzlog pa'i phyir rtogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de la 'jug pa gong ma gnyis las bzlog pa'i phyir rtogs pa smos so //
translated: The word realization is mentioned in order to reverse the two higher forms of engagement.

original: yid kyi cho 'phrul la rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: yid kyi cho 'phrul la rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: There are five types of mental miracles:

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa dang / smon lam mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa dang / 'khor ba dar mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas par mkhas pa dang /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa dang / smon lam mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa dang / 'khor ba dar mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas par mkhas pa dang /
translated: skill in ripening sentient beings, skill in accomplishing prayers, skill in approaching all beings like a wish-fulfilling gem, skill in not abiding in either sa·πÉsƒÅra or nirvƒÅ·πáa,

original: bsam @120b gtan la sogs pa mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: bsam @120b gtan la sogs pa mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: and skill in accomplishing meditative concentration and so forth.

original: de la sems can yongs su smin bar bya ba la mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: de la sems can yongs su smin bar bya ba la mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: Regarding the first, skill in ripening sentient beings,

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dus bzhin du chad ba'i byin rlabs can gyi bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa la mkhas ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dus bzhin du chad ba'i byin rlabs can gyi bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa la mkhas ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said that one is skilled in perfectly displaying all activities that are empowered to ripen and guide beings in accordance with the time.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba dang / yongs su smin ba'i 'dul bar bya ba ste /üîΩde'i don du'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba dang / yongs su smin ba'i 'dul bar bya ba ste / de'i don du'o //
translated: for the sake of the full maturation of the roots of virtue of all beings and for the sake of the conversion of those who are fully matured.

original: dus ji lta ba bzhin du gang gis yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul bar bya ba'i dus gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dus ji lta ba bzhin du gang gis yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul bar bya ba'i dus gang yin pa'o //
translated: The time is the time for the full maturation of those who are to be converted and for the conversion of those who are fully matured.

original: phyad pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'bras bu yod pa'i mthu can gyi bya ba gang yin pa de thams cad yang dag par ston pa de la mkhas pa dag go //
analyzed: phyad pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'bras bu yod pa'i mthu can gyi bya ba gang yin pa de thams cad yang dag par ston pa de la mkhas pa dag go //
translated: They are skilled in the demonstration of all the activities of the transformation of the Buddha, which are effective in the full maturation and conversion of beings, in accordance with the time.

original: smon lam mngon bar sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: smon lam mngon bar sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: Skill in the accomplishment of vows is indicated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la mngon bar sgrub pa bskal pa dang / dus dang / zhing dang / spyod pa la rgyun mi gcod pas gnas pa zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la mngon bar sgrub pa bskal pa dang / dus dang / zhing dang / spyod pa la rgyun mi gcod pas gnas pa zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: The bodhisattva abides in the accomplishment of the vows of all bodhisattvas, without interruption of kalpas, times, fields, and activities.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rnams ni 'di kho na las 'og nas ji skad 'byung ba rnams te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rnams ni 'di kho na las 'og nas ji skad 'byung ba rnams te /
translated: The vows of all bodhisattvas are just these, as they will be described below.

original: de dag mngon par sgrub pa ni grub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag mngon par sgrub pa ni grub par byed pa'o //
translated: Their accomplishment is their realization.

original: de rgyun mi gcod pa ni bzang po dang / skar ma lta bu la sogs bskal pa gang rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i rgyun gyi dus rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba yang dag par ston pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams dang /
analyzed: de rgyun mi gcod pa ni bzang po dang / skar ma lta bu la sogs bskal pa gang rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i rgyun gyi dus rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba yang dag par ston pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams dang /
translated: Their continuity is their non-interruption, which is to say, their non-interruption in the eons of the good, the bad, and the stars, etc., in the times of the continuity of future births, and in the times of the appearance of the Tathagatas and the purification of the Buddha-lands.

original: spyod pa la rgyun chad par mi byad pa ste /
analyzed: spyod pa la rgyun chad par mi byad pa ste /
translated: It is their non-interruption in the practice.

original: de dag gis gnas pa'i dang tshul can gang yin pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis gnas pa'i dang tshul can gang yin pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Those who have that kind of continuity are called those who have the continuity of the vow.

original: de ni smon lam mngon par sgrub pa goms pas dus thams cad dang / yul thams cad dang / gnas thams cad du de dag gi smon lam dag 'byung ngo zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni smon lam mngon par sgrub pa goms pas dus thams cad dang / yul thams cad dang / gnas thams cad du de dag gi smon lam dag 'byung ngo zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows that their vow arises at all times, in all places, and in all situations, through the practice of the accomplishment of the vow.

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'gro ba thams cad nya bar 'tsho ba la mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'gro ba thams cad nya bar 'tsho ba la mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: In the manner of a wish-fulfilling gem, they are skilled in the livelihood of all beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'byor ba'i tshogs bsod nams dang ye shes shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa mi zad pa 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'cho pa la zhugs pa zhes bya ba gsungs so /üîΩbyang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod @121a * //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'byor ba'i tshogs bsod nams dang ye shes shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa mi zad pa 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'cho pa la zhugs pa zhes bya ba gsungs so / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod @121a * //
translated: The accumulation of the wealth of all bodhisattvas is the accumulation of merit and knowledge that is completely perfected, inexhaustible, and engaged in the support of all beings.

original: nams dang ye shes ni don thams cad kyi 'byor par gyur pa'i tshogs 'grub par 'gyur ba'i tshogs nyid yin pas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'byor ba'i tshogs bsod nams dang ye shes te /
analyzed: nams dang ye shes ni don thams cad kyi 'byor par gyur pa'i tshogs 'grub par 'gyur ba'i tshogs nyid yin pas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'byor ba'i tshogs bsod nams dang ye shes te /
translated: The merit and knowledge of all bodhisattvas is the accumulation of the wealth of all bodhisattvas, because it is the accumulation that accomplishes the wealth of all goals.

original: des gzhan gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: des gzhan gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: It is completely perfected, because it completely accomplishes the aims of others in every way.

original: dus thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir mi zad pa ste /
analyzed: dus thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir mi zad pa ste /
translated: It is inexhaustible, because it is uninterrupted at all times.

original: 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de la zhugs pa dag go //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de la zhugs pa dag go //
translated: Those who are engaged in the support of all beings.

original: bsdus pa'i don ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir gang gis na de dag yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar dus rtag tu sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba de ltar byas so zhes bya ba
analyzed: bsdus pa'i don ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir gang gis na de dag yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar dus rtag tu sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba de ltar byas so zhes bya ba
translated: The condensed meaning is that the bodhisattvas have accumulated the collections of merit and wisdom, and thus they act so that they will always be like wish-fulfilling gems for all sentient beings.

original: yin no // 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas par mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: yin no // 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas par mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: In terms of skill in not abiding in cyclic existence or in nirvana,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi shes rab dang thabs dam pa mchog thob pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi shes rab dang thabs dam pa mchog thob pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚Äúthe attainment of the highest, sublime wisdom and method of all bodhisattvas.‚Äù

original: shes rab ni de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: shes rab ni de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Wisdom is the exalted wisdom that observes suchness.

original: thabs ni 'dir snying rje chen por 'dod do //
analyzed: thabs ni 'dir snying rje chen por 'dod do //
translated: Method is asserted here to be great compassion.

original: mchog ni rab bo //üîΩde ni dam pa yang yin la mchog kyang yin no zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar te /
analyzed: mchog ni rab bo // de ni dam pa yang yin la mchog kyang yin no zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar te /
translated: Sublime is excellent.

original: shes rab dang thabs gnyis kyi dam pa mchog de thob pa dag go //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs gnyis kyi dam pa mchog de thob pa dag go //
translated: It is said that they are the attainment of the highest, sublime wisdom and method.

original: de la shes rab kyis ni 'khor ba la mi gnas so //
analyzed: de la shes rab kyis ni 'khor ba la mi gnas so //
translated: By means of wisdom, one does not dwell in the lifecycle.

original: snying rjes ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas so //
analyzed: snying rjes ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas so //
translated: By means of compassion, one does not dwell in the transcendence of suffering.

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa zhes bya bas ni shes rab dang thabs 'di gnyis kyi 'bras bu bstan to //
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa zhes bya bas ni shes rab dang thabs 'di gnyis kyi 'bras bu bstan to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe bodhisattva‚Äôs conduct that reveals the doors to the lifecycle and the transcendence of suffering without interruption‚Äù indicates the result of these two, wisdom and means.

original: rgyun mi gcod pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni re re dang sbyar te /
analyzed: rgyun mi gcod pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni re re dang sbyar te /
translated: The word ‚Äúwithout interruption‚Äù is to be applied to each of the two.

original: 'khor ba'i sgo yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sgo yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The bodhisattva‚Äôs conduct that reveals the doors to the lifecycle without interruption and the bodhisattva‚Äôs conduct that reveals the doors to the transcendence of suffering without interruption.

original: snying brtse bas ni 'khor ba'i sgo yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bltams pa dang / gzhon nu dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa yang dag par ston pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid @121b rgyun mi gcod do //
analyzed: snying brtse bas ni 'khor ba'i sgo yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bltams pa dang / gzhon nu dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa yang dag par ston pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid @121b rgyun mi gcod do //
translated: Through compassion, he does not interrupt the characteristics of the bodhisattva‚Äôs conduct that correctly teach the door of sa·πÉsƒÅra, such as being born, being a youth, and correctly teaching while dwelling in the retinue of queens.

original: shes rab kyis ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par 'byung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rgyun mi gcod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par 'byung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rgyun mi gcod do //
translated: Through wisdom, he does not interrupt the characteristics of the bodhisattva‚Äôs conduct that correctly teach the door of nirvƒÅ·πáa, such as manifesting leaving home.

original: bsam gtan la sogs pa mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: bsam gtan la sogs pa mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: In terms of being skilled in accomplishing meditative stabilization and so on,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes kyi mngon par rol pa'i bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes kyi mngon par rol pa'i bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: It is called the skill in demonstrating all the meditative stabilizations, liberations, concentrations, attainments, superknowledges, and activities of the knowledge of the bodhisattvas.

original: bsam gtan rnams ni dang po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni dang po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The meditative stabilizations are the first concentration, etc.

original: rnam par thar pa ni brgyad do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa ni brgyad do //
translated: The liberations are the eight liberations.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa'o //
translated: The concentrations are the sky-treasury concentration, etc.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po dag go //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po dag go //
translated: The attainments are the nine serial absorptions.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'o ;
translated: The superknowledges are the divine eye, etc.

original: / ye shes ni de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'o //üîΩde dag gi rnam par rol ba'i phyir de dag nyid mngon par rol pa'o //
analyzed: / ye shes ni de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'o // de dag gi rnam par rol ba'i phyir de dag nyid mngon par rol pa'o //
translated: Knowledge is the observation of reality.üîΩThey are the very play because they are the play of those.

original: de dag nyid bya ba thams cad de /
analyzed: de dag nyid bya ba thams cad de /
translated: They are the very activities because they are the activities of those.

original: yid kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: yid kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: They are characterized by mental activity.

original: de ston pa la mkhas pa dag go //
analyzed: de ston pa la mkhas pa dag go //
translated: The wise are those who teach this.

original: lus kyi cho 'phrul ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: lus kyi cho 'phrul ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The miracles of body are of two kinds:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du cig car du 'gro bar yang dag par ston pa dang / 'dul ba dang mthun pa'i lus rab tu snang ba yang dag par ston pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du cig car du 'gro bar yang dag par ston pa dang / 'dul ba dang mthun pa'i lus rab tu snang ba yang dag par ston pa'o //
translated: The miracle of going to the circles of all the Tathagatas simultaneously, and the miracle of manifesting bodies in accordance with the disciples.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba yang dag par ston pa yang dam pa'i chos kyi gtam 'byung bar bya ba'i don dang / chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung ba'i don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /üîΩrim gro bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba yang dag par ston pa yang dam pa'i chos kyi gtam 'byung bar bya ba'i don dang / chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung ba'i don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: The miracle of going to the circles of the Tathagatas is for the purpose of causing the Dharma to be spoken, for the purpose of taking up the wheel of the Dharma, and for the purpose of worshipping and serving the Tathagatas.

original: de la dam pa'i chos kyi gtam 'byung bar bya ba'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: de la dam pa'i chos kyi gtam 'byung bar bya ba'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: In this regard, with regard to the purpose of causing the Dharma to be spoken,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs la dbang thob pas mngon par 'du bya ba med par sems kyi skad cig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba la sngon du 'dren pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs la dbang thob pas mngon par 'du bya ba med par sems kyi skad cig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba la sngon du 'dren pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur
translated: Since they have attained mastery over the power of the bodhisattvas' magical transformation, they are the leaders in the discourse that, without any deliberate effort, in a single instant of mind, goes to the circle of assemblies of all the Tathagatas.

original: ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The verse is to be understood as follows:

original: rdzu 'phrul ni 'gro ba'o //üîΩde'i stobs @122a * //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul ni 'gro ba'o // de'i stobs @122a * //
translated: Magical transformation is going.üîΩIts power is strength.

original: ni mthu'o // de la dbang ba ste de thob pa'o //
analyzed: ni mthu'o // de la dbang ba ste de thob pa'o //
translated: Mastery over that is the attainment of that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pas /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pas /
translated: For that very reason, they are without any deliberate effort.

original: lhun gyis grub par sems kyi skad cig kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du cig car du 'gro ba yang dag par ston to ;
analyzed: lhun gyis grub par sems kyi skad cig kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du cig car du 'gro ba yang dag par ston to ;
translated: They spontaneously demonstrate in a single instant of mind that they go all at once to the circle of assemblies of all the Tathagatas.

original: / des na de dag sngon du 'dren pa'i gtam gyi skyes bu ste /
analyzed: / des na de dag sngon du 'dren pa'i gtam gyi skyes bu ste /
translated: Therefore, they are the leaders in the discourse.

original: de dag ni theg pa chen po'i gtam la gtso bo yin ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni theg pa chen po'i gtam la gtso bo yin ba'i phyir ro //
translated: They are the leaders in the discourse of the Great Vehicle.

original: de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs la dbang thob pa yang yin la /
analyzed: de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs la dbang thob pa yang yin la /
translated: They are the ones who have attained mastery of the power of miracles of all bodhisattvas.üîΩThey are the ones who are the leaders in the discourse that goes to the circle of the assembly of all the Tathagatas in a single instant of mind without any compositional activity.

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med par sems kyi skad cig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i sngon du 'dren pa'i gtam gyi skyes bu 'ang yin no zhes bye brag gi bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med par sems kyi skad cig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i sngon du 'dren pa'i gtam gyi skyes bu 'ang yin no zhes bye brag gi bsdu ba'o //
translated: This is the specific summary.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: In terms of upholding the wheel of the Dharma and making offerings and service to the Tathagatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang / rim gro rgya chen po bya ba la mngon par brtson zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang / rim gro rgya chen po bya ba la mngon par brtson zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúThey are the ones who are dedicated to upholding the wheel of the Dharma of all the Tathagatas and to making vast offerings and service to the Buddhas.‚Äù

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag bar gzung ba dang / rim gro rgya chen po bya ba la mngon par brtson pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩmchod pa ni gdugs la sogs pas so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag bar gzung ba dang / rim gro rgya chen po bya ba la mngon par brtson pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // mchod pa ni gdugs la sogs pas so //
translated: The meaning of the phrase ‚Äúto properly uphold the wheel of Dharma of all the TathƒÅgatas and to strive to perform great service‚Äù is as follows.üîΩWorship is by means of parasols, etc.

original: rim gro bya ba ni bsnyen bkur bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: rim gro bya ba ni bsnyen bkur bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: Service is by means of attendance, etc.

original: 'dul ba dang mthun pa'i lus rab tu snang bar byed pa yang dag par ston pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: 'dul ba dang mthun pa'i lus rab tu snang bar byed pa yang dag par ston pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: With reference to the manifestation of a body that is in accord with the training, he says,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las yang dag par blang pa can gyi mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus rab tu snang bar byed pa thob pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las yang dag par blang pa can gyi mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus rab tu snang bar byed pa thob pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: ‚Äúhaving attained the state of being able to manifest a body in all world-realms through the application of the equality of taking up the actions of all bodhisattvas.‚Äù

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las ni sems can gyi don sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las ni sems can gyi don sgrub pa'o //
translated: The actions of all bodhisattvas are the accomplishments of the aims of sentient beings.

original: de yang dag par blang ba ni legs par khas blang ba'o //
analyzed: de yang dag par blang ba ni legs par khas blang ba'o //
translated: Taking them up is to accept them well.

original: de sngon du 'gro ba can du mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor ba ni rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pa dang / 'dul ba dang mthun pa nyid kyi sa thams cad la sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de sngon du 'gro ba can du mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor ba ni rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pa dang / 'dul ba dang mthun pa nyid kyi sa thams cad la sgrub pa'o //
translated: The application of sameness, which is preceded by that, is the establishment of non-attachment, non-aversion, and the conformity with the training on all the stages.

original: de'i don du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dul ba dang mthun pa'i lus snang bar byed pa gang yin pa lus yang dag par ston pa de thob pa dag go //
analyzed: de'i don du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dul ba dang mthun pa'i lus snang bar byed pa gang yin pa lus yang dag par ston pa de thob pa dag go //
translated: For that purpose, they attain the manifestation of the body, which is the appearance of a body in conformity with the training in all world systems.

original: dag @122b gi cho 'phrul yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: dag @122b gi cho 'phrul yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The miracle of mind is also twofold:

original: dbyangs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa khyab pa dang / tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs kyis bskal pa mtha' yas pa rnams su theg pa chen po rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: dbyangs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa khyab pa dang / tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs kyis bskal pa mtha' yas pa rnams su theg pa chen po rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu ston pa'o //
translated: the pervasion of infinite world systems with sound, and the uninterrupted teaching of the Great Vehicle for infinite eons with various words and letters.

original: de la dang po'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: de la dang po'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: Regarding that, from the perspective of the first, it is said:

original: chos thams cad kyi dbyings ltar chags pa med pa'i dbyangs sgrogs pas khyab par byed pas dus gsum thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems kyi ye shes kyis yul rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi dbyings ltar chags pa med pa'i dbyangs sgrogs pas khyab par byed pas dus gsum thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems kyi ye shes kyis yul rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Since it pervades by proclaiming the unimpeded sound of the realm of all phenomena, it is called ‚Äúthe unimpeded mind-wisdom that pervades all objects in the three times. ‚Äù

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The realm of all Buddha dharmas is suchness.

original: de ltar chags pa med pa ni thogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar chags pa med pa ni thogs pa med pa'o //
translated: Thus, being unimpeded is being unobstructed.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: chos kyi dung ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dung ngo //
translated: It is the Dharma conch.

original: grag par byed pa'i phyir sgrogs pa ste //
analyzed: grag par byed pa'i phyir sgrogs pa ste //
translated: It is called ‚Äúproclaiming‚Äù because it makes sound.

original: dbyangs kyi sgrogs pa yin pas dbyangs sgrogs pa ste /
analyzed: dbyangs kyi sgrogs pa yin pas dbyangs sgrogs pa ste /
translated: Since it is the proclamation of sound, it is called ‚Äúproclaiming sound. ‚Äù

original: dbyangs kyi rgyu ni chos kyi dung zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩdes khyab par byed pa ste /
analyzed: dbyangs kyi rgyu ni chos kyi dung zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // des khyab par byed pa ste /
translated: The cause of sound is the Dharma conch.

original: kun du tshig tu snang ba'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'i /
analyzed: kun du tshig tu snang ba'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'i /
translated: It pervades because it is the appearance of the consciousness that appears as sound.

original: ngag phyi rol na grub pa ni med do //
analyzed: ngag phyi rol na grub pa ni med do //
translated: It is not that speech is established externally.

original: dus gsum thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems kyi ye shes can gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: dus gsum thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems kyi ye shes can gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The Blessed Buddhas are so called because they are endowed with the intuition of the mind that is unattached to all times.

original: sems smos pa ni phyi rol ma grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba tsam du zad pa'o //
analyzed: sems smos pa ni phyi rol ma grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba tsam du zad pa'o //
translated: The mention of mind is merely to the effect that external objects are not established.

original: de dag gi yul ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de /
analyzed: de dag gi yul ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de /
translated: Their object is all world-realms.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chags pa med pa'i dbyangs sgrogs pas khyab par byed pas dus thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems kyi ye shes kyi yul rgyas par 'gengs pa ni khyab par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chags pa med pa'i dbyangs sgrogs pas khyab par byed pas dus thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems kyi ye shes kyi yul rgyas par 'gengs pa ni khyab par byed pa ste /
translated: Since the sound of the Dharma pervades all world-realms, the object of the intuition of the mind that is unattached to all times is filled with pervasion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul 'jig rten gyi khams rnams cig car du dbyangs kyis khyab par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul 'jig rten gyi khams rnams cig car du dbyangs kyis khyab par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that the object of the Tathagata's intuition pervades the world-realms simultaneously with sound.

original: theg pa chen po yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: theg pa chen po yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: With regard to the correct teaching of the Great Vehicle,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sde snod ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sde snod ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The Basket of the Bodhisattvas, etc.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni theg pa chen po'o //
translated: The Basket of the Bodhisattvas is the Great Vehicle.

original: de'i yon tan 'byor ba ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i yon tan 'byor ba ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: The perfection of its qualities is the perfection of virtues.

original: de shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa bskal pa brjod du med par rgyun mi 'chad par bar chad med par yang dag par rab tu bstan pa ste /
analyzed: de shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa bskal pa brjod du med par rgyun mi 'chad par bar chad med par yang dag par rab tu bstan pa ste /
translated: That is completely perfected in the uninterrupted, unbroken teaching for inexpressibly long eons.

original: yang dag par rab tu bstan pa /üîΩde lta bus yon tan bsngags pa @123a * //
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu bstan pa / de lta bus yon tan bsngags pa @123a * //
translated: The teaching of the true teaching.üîΩThe teaching of the praise of virtues.

original: bstan pa ; yon tan bstod pa zad mi shes pa can gang yin pa de dag la de skad ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: bstan pa ; yon tan bstod pa zad mi shes pa can gang yin pa de dag la de skad ces bya ba ste /
translated: Those who have inexhaustible praise of virtues are said to be like that.

original: bskal pa dpag tu med par yang theg pa chen po'i yon tan ston pa rnams kyi yon tan bsngags pa'i bstan pa mi zad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bskal pa dpag tu med par yang theg pa chen po'i yon tan ston pa rnams kyi yon tan bsngags pa'i bstan pa mi zad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The teaching of the praise of virtues of those who teach the virtues of the Great Vehicle for immeasurable eons is said to be inexhaustible.

original: 'di ltar rdo rje'i snying po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grangs phal che ba bstan to //
analyzed: 'di ltar rdo rje'i snying po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grangs phal che ba bstan to //
translated: Thus, the essence of the vajra and so forth indicates the majority of the enumeration.

original: bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang na gtso bor gyur bas de la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang na gtso bor gyur bas de la sogs pa ste /
translated: I am the chief in the retinue of bodhisattvas, and so forth.

original: so sor bstan bar blta'o //
analyzed: so sor bstan bar blta'o //
translated: It should be seen as individually indicated.

original: 'phags pa sa bcu'i mdo sde'i gleng gzhi bshad pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa sa bcu'i mdo sde'i gleng gzhi bshad pa /
translated: The Introduction to the S≈´tra of the Ten Grounds,

original: slob dpon sh'akya'i blos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon sh'akya'i blos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: composed by ƒÄcƒÅrya ≈öƒÅkyabuddhi, is complete.
